vulnerabilities.description: SHA-256 is vulnerable to quantum attacks. Vulnerable to Grover's algorithm (key search). Expected timeline: 2050+

analysis.detail: Algorithm: SHA-256 VEX Status: The vulnerability is being investigated Component: SHA-256 Quantum Threat Type: Vulnerable to Grover's algorithm (key search) Expected Timeline: 2050+ Migration Priority: LOW Recommended Alternatives: SHA-512, SHA3-512

vulnerabilities.description: SHA-512 is vulnerable to quantum attacks. Vulnerable to Grover's algorithm (key search). Expected timeline: 2050+

analysis.detail: Algorithm: SHA-512 VEX Status: Partial mitigation measures are in place Component: SHA-512 Quantum Threat Type: Vulnerable to Grover's algorithm (key search) Expected Timeline: 2050+ Migration Priority: LOW Mitigation measures detected. Full migration to post-quantum algorithms still recommended. Recommended Alternatives: SHA3-512

vulnerabilities.description: AES-128 is vulnerable to quantum attacks. Vulnerable to Grover's algorithm (key search). Expected timeline: 2040-2050

analysis.detail: Algorithm: AES-128 VEX Status: The vulnerability is exploitable in this context Component: AES-128-CBC Quantum Threat Type: Vulnerable to Grover's algorithm (key search) Expected Timeline: 2040-2050 Migration Priority: MEDIUM Recommended Alternatives: AES-256

vulnerabilities.description: RSA is vulnerable to quantum attacks. Vulnerable to Shor's algorithm (factorization/discrete log). Expected timeline: 2030-2035

analysis.detail: Algorithm: RSA VEX Status: The vulnerability is exploitable in this context Component: RSA Quantum Threat Type: Vulnerable to Shor's algorithm (factorization/discrete log) Expected Timeline: 2030-2035 Migration Priority: HIGH Recommended Alternatives: ML-KEM, CRYSTALS-Kyber, FrodoKEM
